reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: we were very happy with this hotel, was great value for money, good service and location, lovely breakfast. 10 minutes walk to Orchard rd. Would definately recommend it.
reviews.title: Good value for money

reviews.text: How I wished I went to this website before I booked into the YWCA hotel.
reviews.title: Horrible experience
Value fof money
reviews.text: As a frequent traveller in Southeast Asia, I have had my share of bad experiences but for a 3-star hotel like this one, I couldn't believe what I saw.

When we first checked in, the room given to us reeked of urine and the toilet seat was broken. Disgusted at what I saw, I requested a room switch which was initially denied by the receptionist. It wasn't until I requested to talk to the manager that I got my room changed.
reviews.title: Tips for Singapore YWCA

likes.liked: — pool/ with room comes an all-you-can-eat buffet breakfast

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Second room had ants in the washroom floor. Ants. The A/C was ridiculously loud and when the hotel sent up a pest control person to deal with the ants, he ended up overspraying my entire washroom with pesticide. Needless to say, my room stank for the rest of the day.
reviews.title: clean and exceed expectations!

reviews.text: This place was sold to us by our home travel agent as acceptable but for the average tourist I think it's very sub standard.
reviews.title: Stinky room &creepy crawlies
if you love ants
reviews.text: The place has an insect infestation they need to get sorted.

reviews.title: Good hotel, value for money
reviews.text: The room we were first shown to had a very "toilet"smell if you know what I mean.

reviews.title: Nice hotel, shame about the noisy groups staying
reviews.text: the room was poorly arranged- we had to re arrange the room just to put our 2 suitcases down. We had trouble with our lift card & got stuck in the lift for 5 mins.
We asked for a room change & the reception staff weren't concerned at all.
reviews.title: Basic Good Value
